title: NotFound.view
content:
# NotFound.view.xml

```xml
<mvc:View
	controllerName="ns.manageproductsneo.controller.NotFound"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc">

	<MessagePage
		title="{i18n>notFoundTitle}"
		text="{i18n>notFoundText}"
		icon="sap-icon://document"
		id="page"
		description="">
		<customDescription>
			<Link id="link" text="{i18n>backToWorklist}" press=".onLinkPressed" />
		</customDescription>
	</MessagePage>

</mvc:View>
```
